name: HONORED WITH THE POLAR MUSIC PRIZE
shortDesription: We are thrilled to announce that on June 14th we will receive one of the most unique and distinctive honors in music, Sweden's Polar Music Prize

name: Sabroso Festival 2018
shortDesription: We're going on the road with Sabroso Festival this year with Pennywise, with stops in Dana Point, Sacramento, Denver, Albuquerque, Tucson, Auburn and Portland!

name: REVOLVER MAGAZINE NAMES THE LAST HERO ONE OF THE TOP 20 ALBUMS OF 2016
shortDesription: With 2016 coming to an end, Revolver has compiled a list of the 20 best albums that came out this year and Alter Bridge's The Last Hero made the cut!
